item.title: Redis Notes
item.description: Installation brew install redis Redis-cli redis-cli is the Redis command line interface which allow you interact with redis server see on offcial site connect to server redis-cli -h yourHost -p yourPort # enable cluster mode redis-cli -c -h yourHost -p yourPort all usage Usage: redis-cli [OPTIONS] [cmd [arg [arg ...]]] -h <hostname> Server hostname (default: 127.0.0.1) -p <port> Server port (default: 6379) -s <socket> Server socket (overrides hostname and port) -a <password> Password to use when connecting to the server -r <repeat> Execute specified command N times -i <interval> When -r is used, waits <interval> seconds per command.
